author: Brian Matthews
comment: Loved the face, but can't use it cuz it doesn't work with Tizen.

author: Carson Saldanha
comment: Please remove the permanent "app" in the app drawer and have it be only a Android Wear watch face. So many other watch faces do this so it doesn't "clutter" your app drawer with unesccesary stuff.

reply.author: Creativo
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! I will update this watch face soon.
